description: Demolition of existing  rear 'lean-to' and garage and erection of a single storey side/rear extension.
decision_conditions: By virtue of its size, depth and design, the proposed single storey side/rear extension would fail to appear as a subservient addition. The proposal would therefore harm the character of the host dwelling and the surrounding area, contrary to the National Planning Policy Framework (2019), Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Core Strategy (2012) and Policy Guidance 33 of the Council's Residential Design Supplementary Planning Document (2013).

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that Condition 6 (Renewable Energy), of permission 19/02817/FUL (Variation of Condition 2 (Approved Plans) of Planning Permission 18/14856/FUL, is hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

You are required to complete the 'Determining whether a Development may be CIL Liable Planning Application Additional Information Requirement form'. This form can be downloaded from the planning portal at https://ecab.planningportal.co.uk/uploads/1app/forms/form_1_cil_additional_information.pdf . Please complete and return as soon as possible. If you have confirmed that the development is Cil Liable, please also complete the Assumption of Liability Form at https://www.planningportal.co.uk/info/200136/policy_and_legislation/70/community_infrastructure_levy/5  and return as soon as possible.
